name: Immigration Programs
description: If you’re eligible to apply for Citizenship, Adjustment of status or green card, or Temporary Protected Status renewal, Mission Asset Fund is offering 0% interest loans to cover the cost of your applications.
fullDescription: If you’re eligible to apply for Citizenship, Adjustment of status or green card, or Temporary Protected Status renewal, Mission Asset Fund is offering 0% interest loans to cover the cost of your applications.
whatTheyOffer: If you’re eligible to apply for Citizenship, Adjustment of status or green card, or Temporary Protected Status renewal, Mission Asset Fund is offering 0% interest loans to cover the cost of your applications.
howToGetIt: For more information re: the details of the program and to apply online go to: https://www.missionassetfund.org/immigration-programs/
